message: Hello Bob, I am offering you our premium product at a special price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item worth significantly more than its asking price, which would otherwise be $15,000. I believe this offer presents a great value for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. It's a fair price considering the value to me and your asking price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given the value of the product, I cannot lower the price below $12,000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
